targets.expr: sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", http_response_status_code=~"$httpErrorPattern", cluster=~"$cluster", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (span_name, http_response_status_code) / ignoring(http_response_status_code) group_left sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", cluster=~"$cluster", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (span_name)

sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_CLIENT", http_response_status_code=~"$httpErrorPattern", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (span_name, http_response_status_code) / ignoring(http_response_status_code) group_left sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_CLIENT", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (span_name)

histogram_quantile($quantiles, sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", http_response_status_code=~"[2-3]..", cluster=~"$cluster", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (span_name, http_response_status_code, le))

histogram_quantile($quantiles, sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", http_response_status_code=~"$httpErrorPattern", cluster=~"$cluster", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (span_name, http_response_status_code, le))

histogram_quantile($quantiles, sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_CLIENT", http_response_status_code=~"[2-3]..", span_name!~"HTTP .*", cluster=~"$cluster", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (span_name, http_response_status_code, http_method, le))

histogram_quantile($quantiles, sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_CLIENT", http_response_status_code=~"$httpErrorPattern", http_host!="", cluster=~"$cluster", span_name!~"HTTP .*", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (span_name, http_response_status_code, http_method, le))

sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_CLIENT", db_system!="", status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR", cluster=~"$cluster", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (db_system, span_name) /
sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_count{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_CLIENT", db_system!="", cluster=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (db_system, span_name)

histogram_quantile($quantiles, sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_CLIENT", db_system!="", cluster=~"$cluster", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (db_system, span_name, le))

histogram_quantile($quantiles, sum(rate(traces_spanmetrics_latency_bucket{service="$service", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_CLIENT", db_system!="", status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR", cluster=~"$cluster", service_version=~"$version"}[$__rate_interval])) by (db_system, span_name, le))
